column5: Does anyone know if there are hard surface biking trails near Lac Suel?
I think you would have a better chance of finding a ferris wheel, or a downhill bobsled track....... (sorry Garry, I couldn't resist!)
No hard surface bike trails. Maybe hwy 105?

There IS a blacktop trail that runs south from Sioux Lookout to the Frog Rapids bridge. I was there last weekend, staying at Frog Rapids Camp, and lots of folks biking and walking, but don't know if you'd consider it to be a "bike trail" in the strict sense of the word.
Maybe just to add/clarify -- THAT trail runs parallel with the highway - and yes, it gets used quite a bit by the locals.
